FuncDef: The display telemetry sensor command displays sampling sensor group information. The display telemetry sensor command displays sampling sensor group information.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a sampling sensor group.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-sensitive characters containing letters and digits. Spaces are not supported between letters or digits.

ExtraInfo: To view the name, subscription information, and subscription status of a sensor group, run the display telemetry sensor command.
